Review Name: Best in the market! Review Description: Look and design is classy and compact. Cooling is good but not as 1.5 tonnes A/c. But it is sufficient for room size upto 90 sqft.Auto swing is not available it's manual only. At temperature of 24 degree it consumes only 5 units for 8 hours. Made in Thailand but some parts are from China. overall worth buying, no regrets.
